statements: SELECT * FROM UserProfiles;
SELECT id, name FROM UserProfiles WHERE email = 'test@example.com';
SELECT id, name, email FROM UserProfiles ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserProfiles WHERE settings->'theme' = 'dark';
SELECT id, name, email FROM UserProfiles WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT id, name, email FROM UserProfiles WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM UserProfiles WHERE email LIKE '%example.com';
SELECT * FROM UserProfiles WHERE settings->>'theme' = 'dark';
SELECT id, name, email FROM UserProfiles ORDER BY name ASC, id DESC;
SELECT id, name, settings->>'theme' AS theme FROM UserProfiles WHERE settings->'notifications'->>'email' = 'true';
SELECT * FROM users_profile;
SELECT name, email FROM users_profile WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM wallet ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM users_profile WHERE name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users_profile WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM users_profile WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM users_profile WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM wallet WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(balance) AS total_balance FROM wallet GROUP BY user_id HAVING SUM(balance) > 5000;
SELECT user_id, name, email FROM users_profile JOIN wallet ON users_profile.user_id = wallet.user_id WHERE wallet.balance < 500 ORDER BY balance ASC, name DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM wallets WHERE balance > 1000.00;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_type FROM transactions WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT users.name, wallets.balance FROM users JOIN wallets ON users.id = wallets.user_id;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_amount > 500;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT user_id, name, email FROM user_profiles ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM wallet WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount < 0;
SELECT user_id, activity_description, activity_date FROM user_activities ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, SUM(balance) AS total_balance FROM wallet GROUP BY user_id HAVING SUM(balance) > 1000;
SELECT t.transaction_id, w.wallet_id, t.amount, t.transaction_date FROM transactions t JOIN wallet w ON t.wallet_id = w.wallet_id;
SELECT u.name, ua.activity_description, ua.activity_date FROM user_profiles u JOIN user_activities ua ON u.user_id = ua.user_id ORDER BY ua.activity_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, settings FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT user_id, name FROM users ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, description, timestamp FROM transactions WHERE wallet_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM wallets WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_amount > 5000;
SELECT u.name, u.email, up.dark_mode FROM users u INNER JOIN user_preferences up ON u.user_id = up.user_id WHERE up.currency_code = 'USD';
SELECT * FROM notifications WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND is_read = FALSE ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
